Name: Toy - Cute Reading Pose
Description:
After using the item, the Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Switch to Reading State button.
Clicking the button will start reading, and clicking the button again will exit the reading state. Clicking the Exit Toy Button will restore the Normal Attack Button.
Description$english:
After using the item, the Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Switch to Reading State button.
Clicking the button will start reading, and clicking the button again will exit the reading state. Clicking the Exit Toy Button will restore the Normal Attack Button.
